description.raw:
This is to support multiple lidar versions. put the actual fine tune of each lidar in the wamv\_gazebo/urdf/sensors/lidar.xacro currently only a placeholder xacro is persent

compatible sensor\_config.yaml with new setup

```
wamv_camera:
    - name: front_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.3
      z: 2
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_left_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: 0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
    - name: front_right_camera
      x: 0.75
      y: -0.1
      P: ${radians(15)}
wamv_gps:
    - name: gps_wamv
      x: -0.85
      z: 1.75
wamv_imu:
    - name: imu_wamv
      x: 1
      y: -0.2
wamv_p3d:
    - name: p3d_wamv
lidar:
    - type: 32_beam
      name: lidar_wamv
      P: ${radians(8)}
```

title.raw: ready for detailed lidar spec input
